Summary: Fireball In sky baffles authorities over atmore alabama
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Atmore
There were no other sightings in Atmore on or around December 26th 1999
divs: sighting detailshttp:\\www.atmoreadvance.com\articles\1999\12\29\export278.txt first, it would be expected by human logic for you to call me and say: "hello, yes, we have already investigated this event. i'm pleased to inform you what went over your area was indeed a meteor which is scientifically documented and proven 100%" "yes, we have it on record." then there would be no need for me to put myself in line for ridicule, harrassment, public humiliation, or possibly even physical danger by reporting some of this story. so i'll share this much with you. the link to the news article does not contain any testimony from me or my family. we have never told a living soul outside our immediate family of anything transpiring that night. or of past events & experiences that are beginning to take shape and form pieces of a larger puzzle. late april 2007: "oh my god!..moma?..moma look! it's like what happened here! moma? moma?" eyes glued to the youtube video in front of me i barely registered the rising panic in my son's voice. i sat transfixed as i watched an almost identical recreation of some actual events we experienced years ago. (an experience we'll never forget, and unexplainably remembered as only about 3 years ago.) although there were slight differences in this report, the main framework remained the same and consistent. even though the youtube video broadcast supposedly took place in a different geographical location(maybe phoenix or arizona)..the resulting phenomena were too similiar to ignore. finally, we were finding similarities & connections to an event that sent chills down my spine & caused my hair to stand on end. although i felt profound relief and not fear. it's as if a light came on...click! never one to leave well enough alone, or give up..i was determined to go back to that late night several years ago to see if i could once and for all settle the disturbing thoughts running rampant in my mind. i figured i had one of 2 choices: 1)plan a: research all scientific data and prove to myself it was most possibly & logically a "meteor" as suggested by some eye witnesses & authorities. (to my knowledge never proven & put under the rug) 2)plan b: if plan a failed admit we were not alone in this universe... plan a failed
